text.free-for-company: Participation in the tender is free, without deposits and blocking of funds! Your company will not pay Service operator's Commission if you are declared the winner of the request.
text.free-for-request: Participation in the tender is free, without deposits and blocking of funds! At the current request, the Service operator's Commission will not be charged if you are declared the winner of the request.
text.payment: Participation in the tender is free, without deposits and blocking of funds! The Service operator's Commission is payable only by the winner of the request as determined by the client and is independent of the actual conclusion of the contract between the client and the winner and the signing of other legally binding documents based on the results of the request.

total.single: The amount of the Service operator's Commission doesn't depend on the amount of the order and is as follows:

no_company.message: Register your company to submit bids to the request. Company already registered? Contact your company administrator.

no_rights.message: You do not have the right to submit bids to the request. Contact your company administrator.

waiting.message: You will be able to submit bids to the request after confirming you as an employee of the company. Contact your company administrator.

refused.message: You have declined to submit a bid to the request. You can submit a bid again until {{acceptanceEndDate}} ({{acceptanceEndDays}} left).

nda_pending.message: Acceptance of bids ended. You have not passed the prequalification / NDA phase and have not submitted a bid.

nda_submitted.message: Acceptance of bids ended. You have not passed the prequalification / NDA phase and have not submitted a bid.

no_proposal.message: Summing up the results from {{summarizeDate}}. You did not submit a bid on time.

with_proposal.message: Summing up the results from {{summarizeDate}}. Your bid is being considered by the buyer.

blocked.message: The buyer excluded you from the request.

refused.message: You have declined to submit a bid in the request.

ask_dialog.title: Try a little later
ask_dialog.text: We are preparing a chat room, usually it takes no more than 10 seconds.

delivery.descr: Place of delivery of goods or services
delivery.title: Place of delivery

description.title: Request description
description.placeholder: Specify the subject of your request ...

contact.title: Contact
contact.append: Add a contact to communicate with vendors

emoji.tooltip: Highlight your request. Only the team sees the icon

files.descr: Add request description, specifications, draft contract.
files.title: Documents
files.tooltip: Add request description, specifications, draft contract. The maximum file size is {{value}} MB.

guest.stub_contact: Information is available after the start on bids submission.

positions.descr: Specify request items for convenient bid comparison
positions.title: Goods and services

questionnaire.descr: Create a vendor questionnaire, set non-price terms of the request and bid comparison criteria
questionnaire.title: Vendor questionnaire

owner.title: Include prequalification section (NDA)
owner.helper: Access to the full documentation upon the submission of this section.

description.title: Prequalification / NDA description
description.placeholder: Describe, what is required for Prequalification / NDA

owner.separator: THE FOLLOWING DETAILS, EXCEPT FOR DELIVERY PLACE, BID AND TAG DEADLINE WILL BE HIDDEN FROM APPLICANTS UNTIL PRE-QUALIFICATION/NDA SIGNING

other.stub:
FULL REQUEST DOCUMENTATION IS AVAILABLE AFTER PREQUALIFICATION / NDA.
PREQUALIFICATION AND SUBMISSION OF A BID IS REQUIRED BEFORE THE END OF THE BID SUBMISSION PERIOD.

language.title: Notification language
language.comment: The selected language will be used for chatbot messages and email notifications for non-registered vendors

major.tooltip: Change of value entails rejection of submitted bids

alternative_proposals.label: Number of alternative bids
alternative_proposals.tooltip: Indicate how many alternative bids the vendor can submit
alternative_proposals.error: Please enter a number between 0 and 10
alternative_proposals.count: Possible number of bids in addition to the main one: {{ value }}
alternative_proposals.none: Submission of alternative bids is prohibited.

expected_price.label: Expected price
expected_price.tooltip: Expected bid price level of the vendor

errors.best_price_unavailable:
Value "best bid" is available if:
 • Bid quantity = Full satisfaction
 • What vendors can view = Competitors' bids
 • Price change rule = Reduction or Auction
errors.step_over_start_price: The change step exceeds the maximum price
errors.best_price_positions_unavailable:
The value "according to the items of the best bid" is available if:
• Items are indicated in the specification by items
• What vendors can view = Competitors' bids
• Price Change Rule = Reduction or Auction
• Percentage reduction set
errors.self_price_positions_unavailable:
The value "according to the items of your bid" is available if:
• Items are indicated in the specification by items
• Price Change Rule = Reduction or Auction
• Percentage reduction set

reference.2: according to the items of your bid
reference.3: according to the items of the best bid

currency.label: Bidding currency
currency.permissions_multicurrency: Allow vendors to submit bids in other currencies
currency.description: The list of currencies can only be changed at the draft stage
currency.change_primary_currency: The base currency has been updated. Change the rates of additional currencies

allow_dialog.title: Remove permission
allow_dialog.text: This will remove the added currencies

tooltips.1: Request is available for viewing and participation only to invited vendors
tooltips.editable: Opened - the vendors are not limited. Closed - available for viewing and participation only to invited vendors

prolongation.label: Auto extension of bids submission
prolongation.tooltip: This is applied when vendors submit a bid before the close of the bid extension window. This window is open for up to 99 minutes.

approximate_deadline_for_summing_up.label: Final closing of bids submission
approximate_deadline_for_summing_up.description: days after the last accepted bid
approximate_deadline_for_summing_up.tooltip: Vendors will await a decision by the tender committee within the specified time period

popover.title: Request for verified vendors
popover.text: Vendors with verified legal registration may submit bids
popover.helper: The site specialists check the vendors and mark them with a special icon

promo_participants.success: Vendors are added to vendors' list

positions_enabled.sub_title: Price, quantity and description of goods and services. The resulting specifications are conveniently compared in Bidzaar.
positions_enabled.title: Goods and services

questionnaire_enabled.sub_title: Questionnaire with questions for the vendor. The resulting profiles are conveniently compared in Bidzaar.
questionnaire_enabled.title: Vendor questionnaire

settings.sub_title: We have customized the request in such a way that you can select the most favorable bid.
settings.title: Request settings

request.stub:
Information is available only to company employees.
Log in or register your company for free on the site.

dialog.info_text: Describe your need with tags. Press enter to add tag

tags.empty_placeholder: Describe the subject of your request with keywords
tags.label: Tags
tags.label_tooltip: Describe your need with tags. By tags, vendors will be able to find an open request or receive an invitation to it by subscription

team.title: Team
team.notice: Add team members and assign their roles

ownerless.title: Team has no owner
ownerless.text: Contact the Department Manager to assign a request to the owner

exclude.title: Do you really want to exclude this member from the team?

role.title: Role changing
role.text: Viewer and Auditor have limited rights. Only the other owner of the request can set owner status.

payment.title: Commission for the winning bid pays
payment.free: There is no service fee on your company's requests
payment.code: There is no service fee on this request (a promo code {{code}} has been applied).

fee.label: Who pays the fee
fee.notice: After the request is published, the value cannot be changed
fee.private: No fee is charged for your company's private requests

tariff.label: Request's Comission
tariff.archive: The selected comission is in the archive, please change the comission

promo.label: Promo code
promo.expired: This promo code has been used

unauthorized.text: Register or login to see all the information about the request

snacks.acceptanceEndDateChanged: End of the bidding round is changed
snacks.there_draft: Finish editing and update the bid
snacks.proposal_submitted: Vendor has submitted a bid, given in Update Comparison
snacks.proposal_update: Vendor updated the bid, update comparison data

owner.title: Owner
